job description:
• We are seeking a computational scientist to join the immune-oncology bioinformatics team.The candidate will Develop and implement algorithms for the analysis of NGS data to identify biomarkers and predictors of response, adverse events and resistance to immuno-oncology therapeutics.
  • Analyze and summarize molecular data derived from oncology clinical trials, both from in-house and public databases.
    • Requirements
  • M.S or Ph. D in Bioinformatics, Computational Biology, Statistics, Applied Mathematics or related filed.2 + years of experience in developing and applying computational biology methods to biological data.
  • Expertise in R preferred
  • Hands-on analysis experience with NGS datasets and scripting in python.
  • Experience in identifying biomarkers and predictors required
